lines.text: I hope you'll enjoy what we've got - if you don't mind taking pot luck?
Can I get a hot dog and a bottle of pop?
Hot dog? Pop?
That's the great national diet in America. I've just come from there.
America? Where is that?
A great open space between New York and Hollywood.
Excuse me, who are these fellows? They're not even listening!
They're my new musicians from Africa.
Africa?
[to musicians]
What part of Africa?
I'm afraid they don't understand you. You see, they talk a strange tongue.

[to musicians]
Parlez-vous Français?
[No response]
Se hable espanol? Capisce italian'?
[No response]
Verstehse bissel Yiddish?
[No response. Ali Baba has a flash of inspiration]
Wait a minute! Hi de hi de ho?
Hee de hee de hee!
Hey de hey de hey!
Ho de ho de ho!
Wait, I think I've got something! You don't have to be a sultan - you can resign!
Resign? Desert my throne? Forsake my people? Allah would never forgive me.
You don't have to desert your people. You can go on being the head man, but instead of sultan you become a president.
A what?
A president, like they have in America.
Well, does he rule the country?
Does he rule the country? Hunh! Ask the Republicans!
